svg.content: <mxfile host="Electron" modified="2021-06-25T00:37:17.973Z" agent="5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/14.6.13 Chrome/89.0.4389.128 Electron/12.0.7 Safari/537.36" etag="DHcPrIuW8PQYq9AZH66K" version="14.6.13" type="device"><diagram id="gRbnGjuRV5rB0WJYjttY" name="Page-1"></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 938px; height: 1px; padding-top: 420px; margin-left: 21px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

p.style: margin-top: 0pt ; margin-bottom: 0pt ; margin-left: 0in ; text-align: left ; direction: ltr ; unicode-bidi: embed ; word-break: normal
p.span: was initiated by Doctors and Hospital Administrators concerned about

span.style: font-size: 18pt ; font-family: "opregular" ; color: rgb(101 , 101 , 101) ; font-weight: bold

p.span: timely and effective medical care to patients in rural areas

span.style: font-size: 18pt ; font-family: "opregular" ; color: rgb(101 , 101 , 101) ; font-weight: bold

p.span: medicine and medical supplies that is not normally available to medical providers in rural areas due to the high cost of maintaining stock or the low frequency of use. Certain medicines and medical supplies may be needed at a moments notice
nts in need, therefore, a fast, reliable, and
transport mechanism is required to make the requested delivery.

p.style: margin-top: 0pt ; margin-bottom: 0pt ; margin-left: 0in ; text-align: left ; direction: ltr ; unicode-bidi: embed ; word-break: normal
margin-top: 0pt ; margin-bottom: 0pt ; margin-left: 0in ; text-align: left ; direction: ltr ; unicode-bidi: embed ; word-break: normal

span.style: font-size: 18pt ; font-family: "opregular" ; color: rgb(101 , 101 , 101) ; font-weight: bold

p.span: organized in a hub, the supply hospital, and spoke, the rural hospital, configuration. The five elements are

span.style: font-size: 18pt ; font-family: "opregular" ; color: rgb(101 , 101 , 101) ; font-weight: bold

p.span: that transport the medicine and supplies,
for rural hospitals to initiate requests
to provide UAV status and location data
, (4) a fulfilment function places the material in the UAV
(5) a storage, maintenance, and charging container
to maintain the UAV. The following
charts provides detailed information on the benefits and operation of the Rural Hospital

p.style: margin-top: 0pt ; margin-bottom: 0pt ; margin-left: 0in ; text-align: left ; direction: ltr ; unicode-bidi: embed ; word-break: normal
margin-top: 0pt ; margin-bottom: 0pt ; margin-left: 0in ; text-align: left ; direction: ltr ; unicode-bidi: embed ; word-break: normal

span.style: font-size: 18pt ; font-family: "opregular" ; color: rgb(101 , 101 , 101) ; font-weight: bold

p.span: to service a small number of rural hospitals to dozens if needed

span.style: font-size: 18pt ; font-family: "opregular" ; color: rgb(101 , 101 , 101) ; font-weight: bold

p.span: to other situations where critical material is needed

switch.text: Rural Hospital Logistics was initiated by Doctors and Hospital Administrators concerned about timely and effective medical care to patients in rural areas. T...
